title: Why did nasus get a buff exactly?????
body: I honestly don't understand riots thinking in buffing unnecessary champions, nasus was insanely strong as it was before with his q stacks getting insanely high and then just pressing w to make his target 200 movement speed and when it ends he can just use it again. But now whenever he ults he gains 50% cooldown reduction on his q???????? I really don't understand why he has gotten this it just feels like he is unstoppable 10 minutes into the game where he just continues to stack while he 3 shots whatever top laner he is against. If they do this big of a buff to nasus why hasn't other champs that are forgotten like aatrox have some sort of buff this big.

replies.body: He had one the lowest winrates for the last 2 years.

because he was garbage
btw he's still garbage
but he wasnt strong he was barely playable... and now with the buffs he sits at a 50% win rate in plat +

It's lower than that, about 48-49 in plat and up and 46-47 in diamond and up. He's literally unplayable if you know how to punish him. The only people who complain about him are those that don't know how to lane, which makes up the majority of everyone below diamond.

Nasus has a win rate 50.00% for Platinum+ players whilst the very best Nasus's are earning a win rate of 57.61% with the average rank of these top players being in Diamond V.

LoLalytics ranks Nasus at 89 amongst all champions earning a tier grade of Gold.

This ranking takes into account the win rate of Platinum+ players, the pick/ban influence of Nasus, the win rate and average rank of the best Nasus players.

http://current.lolalytics.com/champion/Nasus/
He's a low elo stomper; they make it even more disgusting, since high elos don't mind :D

I play Nasus against people who have no idea what they are doing because he is a pub stomper. Otherwise he is the most trash champion walking top. It was honestly just a little change that helps him scale better since he is only good mid game and dies off.
